history.proof: intros T F FF dom H. apply Build_ProperFilter. - intros P FP. sfirstorder depth: 3. - apply subset_filter_filter. sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: intros T F FF dom H.
exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F dom : T -> Prop H : forall P : T -> Prop, F P -> exists x : T, dom x /\\ P x P : {x : T | dom x} -> Prop FP : subset_filter F dom P The term "P" has type "{x : T | dom x} -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "T -> Prop" (cannot unify "T" and "{x : T | dom x}").

ctx: intros T F FF dom H.
exceptions.exn: The reference x was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros T F FF dom H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros T F FF dom H. apply Build_ProperFilter. - intros P FP. specialize (H P FP) as [x [H1 H2]]. exists x; split; auto. - apply subset_filter_filter.
